title: Collective Procurement
description: Bulk purchasing of seeds, fertilizers, and farming equipment at discounted rates for our members.
benefits: Save up to 30% on input costs

title: Market Linkage
description: Direct connection between farmers and buyers, ensuring fair prices and reduced middleman costs.

title: Training & Capacity Building
description: Regular workshops and training sessions on modern farming techniques and business skills.

title: Financial Services
description: Access to credit, insurance, and other financial products tailored for farmers.
